website_summaries.verdict: The full spectrum of plant-based B vitamins, plus biotin and folate to improve the body’s response to stress, encourage heart health, and provide increased energy.
pros: Vegan, raw, non-GMO, and kosher, without fillers or binders
Live probiotics and digestive enzymes to promote gastrointestinal health
B-complex vitamins boost your overall energy level, immune system, and metabolism
cons: Some users report headaches or dizziness with use, and others experience gastrointestinal distress

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really really liked the quality of these vitamins and I was happy to have found them. Unfortunately the company just sold out to Nestlé in December of 2017 which I find to be a questionable company with wrong ethics. I am wondering how much will change in the future and if everything will remain as organic and transparent as before. As for me - I’ll be looking for a new vitamin manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not effective anymore ( ingredients changed)
customer_reviews.text: I use b complex for energy and general well being and now I don’t get the kick of energy I was introduced to. GOL changed their formula and didn’t give us any notice. Thanks Garden of Life.
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: Beware Folic acid
customer_reviews.text: Beware this vitamin says “folate” but it has synthetic Folic acid in it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jayme

customer_reviews.title: Contains Rice Hull Not Listed in Current Pics
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the product delivered. If your going to change the formula you NEED to update the information and pictures in the listing. There are many people who don't consume grains and to add them without telling people is reprehensible. This just goes to remind everyone that you have to reread all the products after they are delivered.
customer_reviews.author: alana

customer_reviews.title: Use it for face and skin health.
customer_reviews.text: I take one capsule a day for skin health. The instructions say take twice a day, but i would start off taking once a day for a week just to see how your body tolerates it. Some people experience gastrointestinal distress when taking two doses a day. I use this in combination with ZInc for acne. The B2 in the capsule makes your urine bright yellow, but this is expected. it's your body filtering out excess B2. I don't know if this helps with nail health, but my nails have gotten stronger and my skin brighter. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Em0905K

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽💗👍🏽 I FEEL GREAT!!️🎉🎊 😃&😌

The ease of digestion but especially the ease of excretion of the B’s my body does not need makes Vitamin Code’s B-Complex superior to all others I have ingested to date. Others have also created unwanted hormonal fluxs and these are agreeing with my body so well👍🏽😌🎉

customer_reviews.title: Good for adrenal fatigue recovery.
customer_reviews.text: I got them to help with my adrenal fatigue. For anyone interested, my current supplement regiment is daily multivitamin, licorice root powder, adrenal support supplement by Gaia and a drop of nascent iodine on the wrist in the day time. For the night time, this B complex, another dose of adrenal supplement, vitamin D, Vitamin C, and magnesium. Something is definitely working. I am able to sleep better at night, am able to do cardio exercises again, have fewer anxiety attacks etc. I do recommend these, especially if you have adrenal fatigue.

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins for energy and mood boost
customer_reviews.text: I am chronically fatigued and I needed something to boost my energy and my mood. I love this vitamin brand and take their vitamins everyday. I fully expected some stomach issues at first because B vitamins are really hard on the stomach. I was pleasantly surprised to find that I had zero stomach issues. These are amazing as long as I take them at a reasonable time of day. I also don’t usually need to take two a day. I take one and if I am still not energised enough, I’ll take another one, but no later than 3 pm.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Energy!!!

And that’s with me only taking one pill since I already had a multivitamin as part of my regimen. I’ve recommended this to my mom and sister and hoping it works just as well for them!

I take two capsules of this along with two capsules of the Kombucha and I've never felt better. My mind is clear and I'm able to recall events/info clearly with no "foggy brain". I'm also more energetic. It's nice to have something so clean and healthy to take. Please never stop making this! 💗

customer_reviews.author: IAM

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with an autoimmune disease and take a B-complex as directed by my doctor. I have been using this product for 3 years and I trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow capsule. Not sure if it did me any good or not.
customer_reviews.author: Dyana

customer_reviews.title: My Only B Vitamins.
customer_reviews.text: I love Garden of Life products. These are my go to B vitamins as they DO NOT CONTAIN FOLIC ACID, but HAS FOLATE. This was a main buying point and the whole food sourced vitamins fit the bill. They are so worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: L Allen

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! I have felt SO much better after taking ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I have felt SO much better after taking this for 6 weeks. I will continue taking these, as I have lots of energy and feel like I can be on the go all day and not get exhausted.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Great B complex vitamin
customer_reviews.text: You can count on Garden of Life products even though they cost a little more than other vitamins. I have found that you get what you pay for. I use, and trade off with, other well regarded products. The B vitamins are important, especially Vitamin B12, as we age. I have added this to my regimen of vitamins that I take. I take it in the afternoon since my whole food active senior vitamin has the B vitamins and I take that in the morning. It's good for your stress level and for added energy.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Helfand

customer_reviews.title: Vitamintastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brand and it definitely works. I just have to be consistent
customer_reviews.author: Cleesy

customer_reviews.title: big pill, hard to absorb.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this pill. It’s not very absorbent. The pill stuck in my throat and you can still taste some flavor every time I take it. It always makes me almost to throw up.
customer_reviews.author: lina

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients/trustworthy brand
customer_reviews.text: This product is said to give you everything you ask for/expect without the additives. I love it and still use it even though my daughter is 15 months old. I have a difficult time swallowing pills in general, so am very pleased with the option to open the capsule and swallow whole. Taste is fine. I only wish the price was lower.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: These are great and have not given me any negative side effects ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great and have not given me any negative side effects like some other B supplements have given me. I had a blood test and my B12 was within the normal range, I think it was at a 6 and 0-8 is the range so these most likely work as good as shots.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle, capsules seem to be high quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, no bad taste, nice bottle, decent quantity, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BigWillyStyle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I've never seen anything like this in packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: The container holding the pills inside the Vitamin Code box was completely broken off. The vitamins were all through the box with the plastic shards from the container. There is no way this happened in shipping. It had to have happened where it was processed. Very disappointed. I've never seen anything like this in packaging before. Probably will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: BeHoldenMe

customer_reviews.title: Tested by a third party and confirmed
customer_reviews.text: This has been tested by a third party and the results were great, in fact, some of the B's exceeded what was indicated on the label.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mayton

customer_reviews.title: Every thing I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Helps reduce my stress response. It works, great product. Also a excellent natural energy booster.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come in heat protected
customer_reviews.text: I would have thought that vitamins would come in heat safe packaging. It was a record hot day of 114 degrees and left in direct sun light. Probably no good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Healthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vitamins! Gives me energy and lessens panic attacks. I love it!😊 Also it's the best price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy J

customer_reviews.title: Like to supplement these every so often.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no side effects as of yet. I've been using it for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kira D. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: The best raw multivitamin product I've used on my life
customer_reviews.text: The best raw multivitamin product I've used on my life. You really feel it in your body. Much better than any synthetic B vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Silveira

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Vitamin B Complex - Vitamin Code Raw B Vitamin Whole Food Supplement, Vegan, 120 Capsules *Packaging May Vary*
product_meta.description:
Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)The B group of vitamins is an eight-member family of water soluble vitamins which means they are not easily stored in the body and need to be replenished frequently. Their functions are so interrelated that it is suggested they be taken together so they can work harmoniously and perform at their peak levels. Cellular energy production is the most important function of the B complex vitamins and they are known as the catalytic spark plugs of our body. Providing mental and physical energy, supporting healthy blood, a healthy heart, immune system function and a healthy response to stress, the B complex vitamins are essential nutrients for the body.

BRAND STORY
By Garden of Life
feature_bullets: B COMPLEX VITAMINS: Our vitamin b complex provides mental and physical energy, supports blood health, heart health, immune system health and healthy stress response
ENERGY SUPPLEMENT: Use our b complex with vitamins B1, B2, B3, B5, B6, B 12, folate and biotin to bump up energy and support metabolism and stress response
HEART HEALTH: Combine our b vitamin complex, containing 400mcg (100percentageDV) of folate with vitamins B6 and B 12 for a healthy heart
PROBIOTICS AND ENZYMES: Our plant based b complex includes a RAW probiotic and enzyme blend for digestive support and vegetable blend for additional nutritional support
VEGAN B COMPLEX: Our real food vegan b complex is RAW, Gluten Free, Dairy Free and non GMO with No Binders or Fillers. Gender - unisex

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
